Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were really pretty and stuff, but I
dunno. This year's whole show was
kinda...plain.
<PAGE>
I thought we were gonna have lots more big
fireworks and stuff that'd really light up the sky.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, that was a pretty awesome Fireworks
Show! It was a real blast - literally!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa! Did you see all those fireworks?! I got
more and more pumped up with every
explosion!
<PAGE>
Huh? That sounds like something a little kid
would say? Who cares? The point is, I was
totally excited the whole time!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The fireworks themselves were kinda plain, but
tonight was still extra special to me, because I
got to watch them with you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I wanna come watch 'em with you next year too.
Promise? Promise! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, it's thanks to you we got to see such an
awesome Fireworks Show this year,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm gonna start saving money right now to
donate for next year's festival!
<PAGE>
Then next year, when you look up and see a
really impressive firework, you'll know it's 'cause
of how impressive of a guy I am. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Woooowww! I never thought I'd see a Fireworks
Show this good in my life!
<PAGE>
You must've donated a small fortune to make
this happen, <MYNAME>. Thanks!
<PAGE>
I'm gonna work really hard so I can make an
even bigger donation and show you a real
humdinger of a Fireworks Show. Promise!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hunh. Well, that was kinda...short. The fireworks
were all really pretty, but I kinda wish there were
more.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh well. We still got to watch them together as
a family. That's good enough for me!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>? How 'bout we both start
saving up money together, so we can make a
huge donation next year?
<PAGE>
That way we'd get to watch an even more
amazing fireworks display than this year.
<PAGE>
Don't get me wrong, this year was great. But
wouldn't it be cool if we donated so much they
spelled out our family name in fireworks?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, that was so good that I can't even stand
still! I'll bet even the big cities don't have
fireworks shows like that.
<PAGE>
Thanks to your huge donation, <MYNAME>, our
whole family got to see some world-class
fireworks. I'll remember that forever! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, if I start working really hard right now and
try to save up money to donate, by next year's
Fireworks Show I'll have...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...next to nothing. Maaan, I really don't know
how much I'll actually be able to save.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I guess I'm either gonna have to hurry up and
become the world's greatest farmer, or find a
gold mine in my back yard and strike it rich.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The three must-have ingredients for summer fun
are fireworks, watermelon, and shaved ice. It's
just not summer without those! ♪

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a lovely display. Few things say
"summer" like a good fireworks show.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a very lovely fireworks display.
Watching it was so entrancing that it felt like it
went by in mere minutes.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was quite an extravagant fireworks display.
It could hold its own against even the fanciest
big-city shows.
<PAGE>
Thank you for the donation that made it
possible, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Watching the fireworks with you, <MYNAME>,
makes them seem that much more beautiful. We
should do this again next year.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were very lovely this year. But the
hour is late. <MYNAME>, be careful on your way
home, won't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I'm treating you like a child again? That wasn't
my intention, I assure you. In fact, let me tell
you one thing I noticed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Seeing your face glowing with awe as you
watched the fireworks made you look even more
mature than usual. My heart skipped a beat.
<PAGE>
So please understand, I am not treating you like
a child. I'm simply a man worried about the
woman he loves walking home in the dark.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight's fireworks display was truly a thing of
beauty. Seeing you get so excited about them
was adorable as well.
<PAGE>
Hahaha! Bashful about that, are we? Your face is
looking rather flushed.
<PAGE>
Hm? How can I see that in the dark? Oh, you'd
be surprised.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Coming here with you has reinforced that even a
beautiful fireworks display will look more
exquisite when watched with someone you love.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm sure this is not the only sight whose hidden
beauties you'll reveal to me. I look forward to
seeing many more in the years to come.
<PAGE>
I can hardly wait.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tonight's fireworks were extraordinary. When did
you save up enough to make such a sizeable
donation?
<PAGE>
You didn't say a thing, so I had no idea until
Veronica made the announcement to everyone.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That unprepossessing kindness of yours hasn't
changed at all in all the time I've known you.
<PAGE>
That is one of the virtues that drew me to you so
much I wanted to marry you. I'm glad it hasn't
changed.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This year's fireworks display was so beautiful it
almost felt like a dream. Now that it's over, I'm
having a hard time coming back to reality.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You know...if this truly is a dream, and I wake
up soon, would that make our marriage all a part
of the same dream?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If it is, I think when I woke up, I'd promptly go
and propose to you again.
<PAGE>
I can hardly imagine spending my life with
anyone else. I want this happiness to last
forever, not melt away as some ethereal dream.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
While the Fireworks Show is beautiful, its end
does remind one that summer is half over.
<PAGE>
Even if you play the optimist and say we still
have half the season left, it feels like it will be as
fleeting as tonight's fireworks.
<PAGE>
If there is anything you hope to get done during
the summer, it would be wise to do it soon.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To many people, nothing says "summer" quite
like a fireworks display, and I'd have to agree
with them.
<PAGE>
But I hear there are some towns that have
fireworks displays even in other seasons.
<PAGE>
A friend of mine works with fireworks, and when
he heard that, he laughed and said he's busy
constantly these days.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As a kid, I always used to imagine fireworks as
explosions in a big space battle. Even now,
thinking about it still makes me smile.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This year's Fireworks Show was pretty amazing.
Thanks to that big donation you made, this'll be
one to remember.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, the fireworks this year totally blew me
away. It felt like it was always upping the ante.
That grand finale really lit up the sky!
<PAGE>
Making that many fireworks -- or heck, just
setting 'em off -- must be a lot of work.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Still, thanks to all that work, we had a first-rate
show. Thanks for the big donation, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This year's Fireworks Show was nice.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Though, ah...I've gotta admit, halfway through, I
was having more fun watching you than the
fireworks.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Y'know, it's not often that the two of us get to
spend this much time together, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>The fireworks were nice, of course, but I was
happier that I got to spend the whole show
chatting with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>In fact, I kinda don't want to head home, now...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks to the huge Fireworks Show they put on
this year, we got to spend lots of quality time
together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Wait, was that why you made that huge
donation this year? Hmm, knowing you, that
probably wasn't the only reason.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Oh well. I almost wish it were the main reason,
'cause I always hope you like being with me as
much as I love being with you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The fireworks were nice this year, but I'm
happier that we got to have some good 'ol family
time.
<PAGE>
We should come watch them together again
next year. Maybe they'll outdo this year's effort.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you think about both of us saving up
money to donate to next year's Fireworks Show?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That way, next year we'll get to see an even
wilder show than this year's.
<PAGE>
I think taking in that good of a show is
something our family would remember for years.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were incredible this year. But the
more amazing the display, the sadder I feel when
it finally ends.
<PAGE>
If I was still single, I think after this great a
show, I would've been depressed for a while.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But hey, I've got you, <MYNAME>. I'm never
down for long when you're around. Having a
family there for you is such a great feeling.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's weird. Fireworks are so fun to watch, but
after the spectacle is over, it can leave you
feeling a little empty inside.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was little, fireworks were sometimes
more scary to me than pretty.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I mean, kids tend to call it like they see it, right?
<PAGE>
The idea of someone shooting a bomb that
exploded in the sky and rained down debris on
us scared the heck out of me.
<PAGE>
When my grandpa would take me to festivals
back then, I'd always be stuck to him like glue.
Looking back on it now, I feel kinda sheepish.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tonight's festival seemed to pass in the blink of
an eye. However, their ephemerality is one of the
best aspects of fireworks, I think.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This year's Fireworks Show was excellent.
<PAGE>
I am surprised at how much of a difference a
slightly greater amount of donated money can
make.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I and, I would think, the entire town are grateful
to you for what you've contributed to tonight's
festivities. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight's Fireworks Show was incredible. I think
I may remember it for the rest of my life. It was
just that breathtaking.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Haha...the look on your face tells me you
wanted to spend more time with me. I feel the
same way.
<PAGE>
In fact, I am surprised at how annoyed I am over
how short a fireworks display can seem.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a lovely fireworks display. And it is largely
thanks to your generous donation, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
However, a small piece of me hopes that your
considerate donation was not just to make the
show better for all the town to enjoy...
<PAGE>
...But so that this year's display would be even
longer, allowing us to spend that much more
time together watching it.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a breathtaking fireworks display. And it is
thanks to your generous donation, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>However, if you become even more popular with
the entire town than you already are, keeping
you to myself will get more and more difficult.
<PAGE>
While I am glad for your wonderful generosity, a
piece of me feels somewhat...conflicted about it
as well.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight's Fireworks Show was lovely. I am glad
we were able to watch it as a family. We should
do this again next year.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tonight's fireworks were lovely, but where on
earth did you earn the money to make such a
massive donation?
<PAGE>
And you kept it completely secret, too. I would
have let others know how much I was donating,
to increase their opinion of me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Still, a thought like that would never cross your
mind. That's one of the many things that makes
me treasure you so.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This year's Fireworks Show was so beautiful it
was almost as if it were a dream.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But...if this were a dream, would that mean our
marriage would also vanish when we awoke? If
so, what would you do?
<PAGE>
Would you still come to me and tell me you love
me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Personally, I would promptly look for you and
declare my love. And I would continue to do so
until we made our present bliss anew.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No matter how many fireworks displays I see, I
never grow fully accustomed to the loud cracks
and booms.
<PAGE>
I have never liked that strange feeling of being hit
in the chest that happens with the loudest of the
booms.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? What is a firework made of?
<PAGE>
A fascinating topic of discourse. Fireworks were
originally created to take advantage of certain
chemical reactions, so they are comprised of--
<PAGE>
Blah blah blah gunpowder, yakkity yak yak yak...
Actually, in the days of antiquity...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...And that is how they are made. Do you
understand now? No, no. Your expression tells
me everything I need to know.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were pretty, yeah, but it's obvious
they were doing what they could on a shoestring
budget.
<PAGE>
Still, I kinda like this town. Maybe I'll try to
donate a little more next year.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Honestly, tonight's fireworks were better than I
expected.
<PAGE>
I usually get too sleepy to bother with late-night
events, but I'm glad I came out to this one.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard you worked hard enough to plunk down
a fat donation for tonight's fireworks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thanks. I had a really good time at the show.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Watching tonight's fireworks with you kept me
busy enough I didn't yawn even once. ...And
thank goodness it's dark out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Uh, nothing. So, yeah. The fireworks were swell.
I had a fun time.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, you sure looked like you had fun. Do you
really like fireworks that much?
<PAGE>
Me? I had more fun watching you than the
fireworks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>B-because, uh...your expression kept changing!
It was funny. Th-that's why!
<PAGE>
It's not like I ignored all the fireworks just to
watch you the whole time.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight's fireworks were great. The bangs
startled you though, right?
<PAGE>
I noticed you jump a little every time one of
them went off. That was kinda cute--
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...! Um! N-no wait, th-that's not what I meant...I
uh...er...
<PAGE>
AUGH! Heck with it. That's the truth and trying
to take it back now is too much of a pain. So
just take it for what it is.
<PAGE>
...Stop it with the stupidly happy grin, would
you? Hmph.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight's fireworks were pretty. Maybe a bit on
the sparse side, though. Still, this is something
we only get once a year.
<PAGE>
Maybe we should work a little harder so we can
donate more for a bigger show next year.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight's fireworks were great. Let's come back
and watch them as a family again next year.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was sure the Fireworks Show to end all
Fireworks Shows! It's like they asked themselves,
"How many can we set off all at once?"
<PAGE>
I was a little sleepy at first, but that's all gone
now. In fact, I'm so awake I'll probably have
trouble going to sleep when we get home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What, you want to hold hands when we go to
bed? Are you a baby now? That might help you
sleep, but it only makes it harder for me!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone looked excited to watch the fireworks,
but now they've remembered how late it is. All
the kids look ready to fall asleep.
<PAGE>
I saw the innkeeper's littler one rubbing her eyes
and yawning a bit ago.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Whoever thought up fireworks was incredible. I
mean, someone had to think, "Let's make things
explode in COLORS for entertainment!"
<PAGE>
I can't even imagine how they put the first ones
together without blowing themselves up.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a really nice fireworks display. Though
looking back on it, it did feel a little short.
<PAGE>
Still, it had its own kind of charm. Maybe it's
better this way, not being too ostentatious.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a really beautiful fireworks display.
Thanks for your donation, <MYNAME>. That
really turned tonight into a spectacle.
<PAGE>
I glad I came. I had a great time tonight.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Up until tonight's show I'd never thought just
adding more and more fireworks would
automatically make it a better show.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I think I'm gonna change my tune, there.
Tonight's show was big, ostentatious, and a
total blast.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm glad I had the chance to watch tonight's
fireworks with you, <MYNAME>. I had a great
time.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's thanks to your donation that we got such an
amazing Fireworks Show this year. Thanks,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Since you've given us all such a great present
tonight, I kinda want to give you a thank-you gift
in return...
<PAGE>
Nah, don't worry about it. I just want to give you
something.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Besides, er... Without excuses like this, I can
never come up with the right timing to give you
presents.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow. That was a mind-blowing fireworks
display! My heart's still pounding from all the
light and thunder!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Or, ah...maybe it's pounding because I got to
spend tonight watching the show with you.
<PAGE>
My heart always races whenever we're together.
Being with you is the one thrill in life that never
stops.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight was a great show. I'm glad we got to
come watch it together as a family. Let's do this
again next year.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You really do like fireworks, don't you
<MYNAME>? You looked like you were having a
blast the whole time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So much so, in fact, I was having a hard time
focusing on the fireworks myself...
<PAGE>
Thinking back on it, I think I watched you the
whole time. That's weird. I see you every day,
but I couldn't stop myself...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's kinda sad to watch a fireworks show come
to an end. Seeing how amazing this year's show
was only makes it worse.
<PAGE>
If I was still single, I might've gone home
depressed. Thank goodness I have you in my
life.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I think I'll be all right. A house with you in it is
always a house I want to come back to.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've seen other towns set off fireworks during
things like afternoon parades...
<PAGE>
...But I think setting them off at night like this is
the best by far. You really get to take in the
beauty of the colors.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I get home, I want to put together a flower
arrangement that'll remind people of tonight's
fireworks display.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I don't know if I'm skilled enough yet to pull it
off, but hey, we learn by doing!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I had higher hopes for this "Fireworks Show,"
but it seems it barely even qualifies as a "show."
<PAGE>
Ah well. For a country town like this, that much
of a display was admirable enough.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a better display than I expected from a
country town like this. I enjoyed it more than I
expected.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Still, I wish they had announced earlier they
were accepting donations for the show. Had I
known, I would have donated all they needed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I hope next year they will announce that they're
accepting donations at an earlier stage.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a lovely fireworks display. ♪ I never
expected to see such a first-rate show in a
country town like this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Though, er, I must admit I'm slightly annoyed
that you out-donated me this year...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Still, it is thanks to your generosity that we had
such a wonderful show this year. You may even
deserve a compliment. Well done. ♪

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There were fewer fireworks than I had hoped...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But the time I spent with you was much more
pleasant than I had anticipated. I had a
wonderful evening.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a lovely fireworks display. Quite
memorable, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Though I must admit, any evening I get to spend
with you is automatically a memorable one...
<PAGE>
Er...never mind! I was simply saying you ought
to work harder so that you can donate more to
next year's display!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What an excellent fireworks display! I feel as
though I'm still lost in that bright, enchanting
world.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Er...<MYNAME>? I would not at all mind if you
asked to escort me home tonight.
<PAGE>
Oh, you can be so dense at times! I am saying I
want to continue enjoying this happy feeling, so
I would like to spend more time with you!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
While the display itself felt somewhat
insufficient, simply being able to watch it with
you made it ever so much more fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Let's come watch next year's display as a family
again.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>? Did you make such a generous
donation to this year's display in the hopes of
having a lovely show for me to watch?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>That is where you say "of course!" even if it isn't
precisely true. Ugh! You are so clueless about
what a lady wants to hear.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Still, that unflagging honesty is one of your
most winsome traits.
<PAGE>
You, always straightforward to a fault, and I have
trouble being straightforward even when I try.
We make an oddly good match, do we not?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight's fireworks were so beautiful, I almost
felt as though I was seeing a dream.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hm? What if this life we have together was all
simply a dream? What would I do then?
<PAGE>
Hmph! You're good at asking questions to which
the answer should already be glaringly obvious.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Of course I would promptly make you fall for me
so that we could be married all over again.
<PAGE>
In fact, I can't even imagine marrying anyone
other than you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
While I was growing up, my family would often
put on house parties where we would have a
small fireworks display.
<PAGE>
Why, one year, for my elder sister's birthday
party my father went so far overboard...
<PAGE>
He commissioned a famous orchestra to play in
time with the launching of thousands of
fireworks. It surprised everyone, to say the least.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>When it comes to my sister, Father always
quickly loses sight of everything else. I guess
that means he just loves her that much.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fireworks start out as little more than round
bombs tossed into the air, correct?
<PAGE>
I wonder how they can coax such lovely
explosions from balls and tubes packed with
gunpowder. It's quite strange.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Some people may say that this year's Fireworks
Show was average, but some things stand out
precisely because they're average.
<PAGE>
Personally, I like watching shows like this,
where you have more time to appreciate the
uniqueness of each individual firework.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was beautiful. This year's fireworks truly
were fiery blossoms blooming in the sky. I
would love to watch again next year.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, what an excellent show! I'm really surprised
at how impressive it was.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It's thanks to your generosity that I had such a
marvelous time tonight.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>, for giving such a lovely
present to everyone in this town.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a lovely fireworks display. Though I had
hoped to spend more time with you. It's
unfortunate the show was over so quickly.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight's Fireworks Show was so beautiful.
<PAGE>
Though, it may be spending time with you that
really made the evening special. I'd love to do
this again next year.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What an amazing Fireworks Show! They lit up
the sky so brightly tonight that I could see your
face clearly in the glow.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Though you were far too entranced by the
fireworks to notice me looking at you.
<PAGE>
I can't believe I'm admitting it, but I felt a bit
jealous, wishing you'd pay a little more attention
